title: BRIEF-Goldfield Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.13
text: March 14, 2018 / 8:54 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Goldfield Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.13 Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Goldfield Corp: * GOLDFIELD ANNOUNCES 2017 FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 * AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, TOTAL BACKLOG INCREASED TO $214.2 MILLION, FROM $190.0 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2016 * QTRLY ‍TOTAL REVENUE DECREASED 6.7% TO $29.6 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
